name: Ancient Treasure
description:
An fps adventure and realistic game.

You're caracter has the objective of hunting mercenaries and their boss who stole an ancient treasure, made of a very rare metal called Rossium, from your family.

You will be passing through increasingly difficult levels, various environments, you can use a gun to kill the enemies, a drone to locate them, and you can see their remainning bullets above them, before they have to reload and their health by a health bar. You can also dodge the enemies bullets (they are really slow).

Beware of the enemies, they will run after you.
